people_also_ask.question: Is Prince of Persia is real story?
people_also_ask.heading: The Prince is the name given to a group of fictional characters who act as the main protagonists of the Prince of Persia franchise, developed and published by Ubisoft. ... The Prince was originally created by Jordan Mechner for the original 1989 game.
people_also_ask.title: Prince (Prince of Persia) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Was Prince of Persia a Flop?
people_also_ask.heading: Producer Jerry Bruckheimer optioned the Prince of Persia theatrical rights to the video game property in March 2004 for seven figures. ... Instead of a lucrative franchise, Disney took a massive unspecified write-down on Prince of Persia: The Sands Of Time and it joined the ranks as one of the biggest flops of 2010.
people_also_ask.title: Prince of Persia: One of the Biggest Flops of 2010 | Bomb Report

people_also_ask.question: Why is Prince of Persia famous?
people_also_ask.heading: One of the era's most memorable titles was 1989's Prince of Persia, a Jordan Mechner-designed side-scroller that proved influential for its smooth animation and realistic depiction of human movement. In the years since, Prince of Persia has proved a resilient franchise, spawning at least nine sequels and remakes.01-Oct-2009
